patterns: How you could help me?

What help you provide?
How you can be helpful?
What support is offered
responses:
I am a general purpose chatbot. My limited capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. Talk to me, express your feelings. 
 Thank you!!

patterns: Tell me a joke
Joke
Make me laugh
Tell me something funny
Tell me a funny joke
responses: A perfectionist walked into a bar...apparently, the bar wasn't set high enough
I ate a clock yesterday, it was very time-consuming
Never criticize someone until you've walked a mile in their shoes. That way, when you criticize them, they won't be able to hear you from that far away. Plus, you'll have their shoes.
The world tongue-twister champion just got arrested. I hear they're gonna give him a really tough sentence.
I own the world's worst thesaurus. Not only is it awful, it's awful.
What did the traffic light say to the car? "Don't look now, I'm changing."
What do you call a snowman with a suntan? A puddle.
How does a penguin build a house? Igloos it together
I went to see the doctor about my short-term memory problems - the first thing he did was make me pay in advance
As I get older and I remember all the people I've lost along the way, I think to myself, maybe a career as a tour guide wasn't for me.
o what if I don't know what 'Armageddon' means? It's not the end of the world.

patterns: Ask me a riddle
Ask me a question
Riddle
responses: What two things can you never eat for breakfast?.....Lunch and Dinner!
What word is spelled incorrectly in every single dictionary?.....Incorrectly
How can a girl go 25 days without sleep?.....She sleeps and night!
How do you make the number one disappear?.....Add the letter G and it's 'gone'!
What will you actually find at the end of every rainbow?.....The letter 'w'
What can be caught but never thrown?.....A cold!
What has a thumb and four fingers but is not actually alive?.....Your Gloves!
What 5-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?.....Short
Why can't a bike stand on it's own?.....Because it is two-tired.

responses: Undergraduate courses are offered in KGEC in the field of Engineering. In undergraduate couses KGEC offers B.Tech degree only.
Only B.Tech degree is offered in KGEC in the field of Engineering as an undergraduate course.
In undergraduate courses KGEC offers B.Tech degree only.

patterns: How to get admission in KGEC for undergraduate degree?
How to take admission for BTech in KGEC?
What is the process for admission in KGEC for engineering?
By which exam can I take admission in KGEC for engineering?
How can I do engineering in KGEC?
responses: Admission is taken through WBJEE(West Bengal Joint Entrance Examination). Diploma holders can take admission through WB-JELET(West Bengal Joint Entrance Examination of Lateral Entry) in B.Tech 2nd year.
You can take admission in KGEC by appearing for WBJEE. If you are a Diploma holder, you can appear for WB-JELET.
There are two ways of getting into KGEC. Number 1 via WBJEE and number 2 by WB-JELET in the second year.

patterns: How to get admission in KGEC for MTech degree?
How to take admission for MTech in KGEC?
What is the process for admission in KGEC for masters?
By which exam can I take admission in KGEC for masters?
What is the process for admission in KGEC for MTech?
By which exam can I take admission in KGEC for MTech?
How can I do MTech in KGEC?
How can I do masters in KGEC?
responses: Admission for MTech is taken through GRADUATE APTITUDE TEST ENGINEERING (GATE).
You can take admission for MTech in KGEC by appearing for GATE.
You need to appear for GATE exams to get admission in MTech.

patterns: How to get admission in KGEC for master in computer science degree?
How to take admission for MCA in KGEC?
What is the process for admission in KGEC for MCA?
By which exam can I take admission in KGEC for MCA?
How can I do MCA in KGEC?
responses: Admission is taken through JECA (West Bengal Joint Entrance Exam MCA). Candidate must acquire 1st class in BSC.
You can take admission in KGEC by appearing for JECA.
You need to appear for JECA exams to get admission in MTech.
You can take admission in KGEC by appearing for JECA. You need to have 1st class in BSC
You need to appear for JECA exams to get admission in MTech. 1st class in BSC is required.

patterns: What are the post-graduate courses available in KGEC?
What are the master courses available in KGEC?
What can I do in KGEC after engineering?
What can I do in KGEC after BTech?
responses: You can do MTech or MCA after your engineering in KGEC
KGEC offers MTech and MCA courses.
You can opt for MTech or MCA as master courses in KGEC.
You can opt for MTech or MCA as post-graduate courses in KGEC.
